name: whoogle
description: Whoogle Search is a self-hosted, ad-free, privacy-respecting metasearch engine that proxies Google results. It strips tracking, blocks ads, supports search filters, and can be used as a default search provider across browsers and devices.

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Search Google results without tracking, cookies, or personalized ads

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Strip tracking parameters and redirects from result URLs to protect privacy

features.title: Custom Filters
features.description: Configure content filters, safe search settings, and result preferences

features.title: Dark Mode
features.description: Switch between light and dark themes for comfortable searching in any environment

features.title: Search Shortcuts
features.description: Use bangs and shortcuts for quick searches on specific sites or services

features.title: No Javascript Required
features.description: Core functionality works without JavaScript for maximum compatibility and privacy
